text:
SF Bay Area: GenoPharmix - Genomic Data Science Focused on Human Health & Lifespan

Full or part-time, Interns welcome.

- Software Developer with an interest in Vector Space, advanced experimental machine learning, inductive logic programming, cognitive computing, Computational Theory of the Mind (CTM) and other biomimetic approaches to finding meaningful patterns in non-sparse large data set verticals in the Life Sciences areas.

Email: genopharmix@gmail.com http://genopharmix.com
